name: POTLATCHDELTIC CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Discussions relating to the negotiation of a new Softwood Lumber Agreement between Canada and the United States.
S. 538, The Timber Innovation Act of 2017; a bill to accelerate the use of wood in buildings, especially in tall wood buildings.

The 2018 Farm Bill

HR 3354/S3068 Interior, Environmental, and Related Agencies Appropriations; all provisions related to forestry.
